name: Healthy & Delicious: No-Cook Berry Crisp
description: A simple, seasonal, vegan-friendly treat devised by the good people at Whole Foods, No-Cook Berry Crisp is suitable for either breakfast or dessert. A dollop of yogurt will orient it more towards the morning, while a scoop of vanilla would make it nighttime-appropriate.
recipeIngredient: 6 cups mixed berries, such as blackberries, blueberries, raspberries and sliced strawberries
1 tablespoon pure maple syrup (more if the berries need sweetening)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pecans, walnuts, dates, and cinnamon in a food processor. Pulse until coarsely ground.
Sprinkle nut/date mixture evenly over the berries. Eat a.s.a.p. or store in the fridge for a few hours.
